fr.laple.language

Class Symbol

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.laple.language.Symbol

  • public class Symbol
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a symbol, which is the most important element for this software. A symbol is a generic object which act as an association, values here are equals but in different contexts.
    Author:
    anthonyrey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Symbol

        public Symbol(java.lang.String uLangTr,
              java.lang.String sym,
              javax.swing.ImageIcon symImage,
              javax.swing.ImageIcon animImage,
              javax.sound.sampled.Clip pronunciation,
              java.lang.String translation)
        This is the constructor to create a Symbol
        Parameters:
        uLangTr - A string corresponding to the "western transcription" of the symbol (ex : "a")
        sym - A string containing the actual symbol (ex : "„ÅÇ")
        symImage - An ImageIcon containing the image for the symbol
        animImage - An ImageIcon containing the animation for the symbol (a gif somewhat)
        pronunciation - A Clip for the pronunciation of the symbol
        translation - A string containing the translation (used for words)
